title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 269/86 of 6 February 1986 extending for the 1986 marketing year, Regulation (EEC) No 300/85 derogating from the quality standards for cucumbers for the 1985 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 269/86
of 6 February 1986
extending for the 1986 marketing year, Regulation (EEC) No 300/85 derogating from the quality standards for cucumbers for the 1985 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1986 marketing year, the derogations provided for in Annex I/2 to Regulation No 183/64/EEC by Regulation (EEC) No 300/85 are maintained.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 February 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 362, 20. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No 192, 25. 11. 1964, p. 3217/64
(4) OJ No L 96, 10. 4. 1976, p. 30.
(5) OJ No L 157, 28. 6. 1969, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 33, 6. 2. 1985, p. 7.
